content:
Looks like zulip 3.0 has been released :) (this instance is running 2.2)
changelog: https://blog.zulip.com/2020/07/16/zulip-3-0-released/
though we do have the new logo which took me sometime to comprehend what's it about :grinning:
This instance is hosted on Zulip Cloud, which runs a varying bit behind the main development branch; so it's constantly getting new features. Server releases don't really have any effect here.
